about_the_game:
Prepare for a captivating and addictive experience in JezzBall Classic Deluxe Edition, the ultimate evolution of the classic arcade game! Engage in a fast-paced and strategic gameplay as you divide and conquer the bouncing atoms while constructing walls. Can you conquer the challenging levels and become the supreme JezzBall master?

Gameplay: JezzBall Deluxe takes you on a thrilling journey into colorful and dynamic playing fields. Your objective is to confine the energetic atoms by building walls and capturing as much space as possible. Using your mouse, click and drag to create walls, enclosing areas without any atoms.

As you construct walls, make sure they extend horizontally or vertically, connecting from one side of the playing field to another. When a wall successfully completes without being intercepted by an atom, the enclosed area fills up, earning you points and clearing that portion of the field.

Beware of the bouncing atoms! If an atom collides with a wall while it's being constructed, the wall stops, and you lose a life. Each level grants you lives equivalent to the number of atoms present, providing you with strategic opportunities.

To progress to the next level, you must capture a specific percentage of the playing field before the time runs out. With each level, the challenge intensifies as more atoms fill the field, demanding quick reflexes and careful planning.

Features:

  • Captivating gameplay inspired by the classic JezzBall arcade game.

  • Fast-paced and strategic wall-building mechanics to confine bouncing atoms.

  • Use your mouse to click and drag, creating walls and enclosing areas.

  • Earn points and clear the field by successfully completing walls without atom collisions.

  • Lives are provided based on the number of atoms in each level, allowing calculated risks.

  • Progressive difficulty with increasing atom count, testing your reflexes and strategy.

  • Time limit adds excitement, requiring swift decision-making and precise wall placement.

  • Unlock new levels as you surpass the capture percentage within the allotted time.

  • Colorful and dynamic playing fields enhance the visual experience.

  • Embrace the nostalgic charm of JezzBall while enjoying modern enhancements and challenges.

Get ready to embark on a thrilling adventure with JezzBall Deluxe! Immerse yourself in this addictive arcade game, showcase your wall-building skills, and aim for the top of the leaderboard! Can you conquer the ever-challenging levels and become the ultimate JezzBall master?

short_description: In JezzBall, your goal is to contain bouncing Jezz atoms by building walls. Complete levels by converting over 75% of the chamber into walls, adding a new atom each time. Left-click to deploy walls and right-click for direction.
